Consciousness.short_description: Fundamental field of awareness and subjective experience.

Intelligence.short_description: Capacity for understanding, reasoning, and adaptive response.

Psyche.short_description: Total sphere of mental and psychological phenomena.

Cognition.short_description: System of mental processes for knowing and understanding.

Awareness.short_description: Field of receptivity and recognition at different levels.

Will.short_description: Force of intention and directed mental activity.

Memory.short_description: System of recording, storing, and accessing mental content.

Intuition.short_description: Direct knowing beyond rational thought processes.

Citta.short_description: Buddhist concept of mind-heart consciousness complex.

Noetic.short_description: Realm of pure intellectual perception and knowledge.

Buddhi.short_description: Hindu concept of higher discriminative intelligence.

Manas.short_description: Sanskrit term for mind as sensory-processing organ.

Logos.short_description: Universal principle of reason and ordered thought.

Nous.short_description: Greek concept of highest faculty of mind and intelligence.

Unconscious.short_description: Realm of mental activity beyond conscious awareness.

Subconscious.short_description: Mental processes occurring below conscious threshold.

Collective Mind.short_description: Shared mental space of groups or entire species.

Mental Body.short_description: Vehicle of concrete thought in esoteric psychology.

Causal Mind.short_description: Level of mind dealing with fundamental patterns and causes.

Mindstream.short_description: Buddhist concept of continuous flow of mental events.

Witness.short_description: Pure observing faculty beyond thought processes.

Mentality.short_description: Characteristic mode or pattern of mental activity.

Ideosphere.short_description: realm of ideas and conceptual thought forms.

Metacognition.short_description: System of awareness and regulation of thought processes.

Mindfield.short_description: Total field of mental phenomena and potential.

Noosphere.short_description: Global sphere of human mental activity and thought.

Ground Consciousness.short_description: Fundamental basis of all mental phenomena.

Pure Mind.short_description: Mind in its essential nature beyond conditioning.

Mental Plane.short_description: Level of reality composed of mental substance.

Thought-sphere.short_description: Field of mental activity and thought radiation.

Cognitive Field.short_description: Space of potential mental operations and knowledge.

Mental Complex.short_description: Organized system of related mental contents.

Mind Stream.short_description: Continuous flow of mental states and processes.

Mindscape.short_description: Total landscape of mental experience and activity.

Cognitive Domain.short_description: Specific area or type of mental functioning.

Mind Essence.short_description: Ultimate nature of mind beyond appearances.
